title: Rachel Dustbin's dog and the law
creator_credit: Murray Reece and Gibson Film Productions
brief_description: Traces the law making process through the example of Rachel and her dog. Rachel’s dog is a noisy dancing dog who attracts spectators from everywhere. The noise upsets the neighbours who lobby to introduce a law against noisy dogs. Highlights process of bringing a law into being from drafting stage to becoming an act of law. Animated film. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
